parameters.name: MatchType
parameters.description:
Query type for the transport layer application host record, supporting the following 4 types, with exact query as the default.

- fuzzy: Fuzzy query.
- exact: Exact query.
- prefix: Prefix match query.
- suffix: Suffix match query.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: Page number set for pagination. Starting value: 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: Page size. The maximum value is 500.

parameters.name: RecordName
parameters.description: Host record of the transport layer application.

parameters.name: SiteId
parameters.description: Site ID, which can be obtained by calling the [ListSites](~~2850189~~) API.
